channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC HMI Unified Comfort Panels
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC HMI Unified Comfort Panels

item.title: CVE-2020-15787|2024-08-04T13:22:30.904Z -- siemens -- simatic%20hmi%20unified%20comfort%20panels
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC HMI Unified Comfort Panels (All versions <= V16). Affected devices insufficiently validate authentication attempts as the information given can be truncated to match only a set number of characters versus the whole provided string. This could allow a remote attacker to discover user passwords and obtain access to the Sm@rt Server via a brute-force attack.
